perturbation.original_text:
The parties wish to produce a series of recorded compilations and companion song books featuring praise and worship repertoires, which will be co-branded and co-marketed throughout the world. Now, therefore, the parties agree as follows:

1.       Product Concept and Creation.

      a.       Product description. The product to be created under the                   series trade name "Songs 4 Worship" will be a praise and                   worship continuity series, with each volume in the series                   containing approximately 22 songs. Each volume will be                   manufactured in Double CD, Double Cassette, and song book                   formats, with standard double jewel boxes, inlays, booklets                   and j-cards (the "Product"). TL and Integrity will jointly                   develop the repertoire, and all repertoire selections are                   subject to master, mechanical and print rights clearance in                   accordance with the financial terms established below. The                   exact songbook format, song selection and number of songbook                   volumes has not yet been determined, and TL has no obligation                   to sell any songbooks produced pursuant to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
The parties wish to produce a series of recorded compilations featuring praise and worship repertoires, which will be co-branded and co-marketed throughout the world. Now, therefore, the parties agree as follows:

1.       Product Concept and Creation.

      a.       Product description. The product to be created under the                   series trade name "Songs 4 Worship" will be a praise and                   worship continuity series, with each volume in the series                   containing approximately 22 songs. Each volume will be                   manufactured in Double CD and Double Cassette formats, with standard double jewel boxes, inlays, booklets and j-cards (the "Product"). TL and Integrity will jointly                   develop the repertoire, and all repertoire selections are                   subject to master and mechanical rights clearance in accordance with the financial terms established below. The songbook format, song selection and number of songbook                   volumes has not yet been determined, and TL has no obligation                   to sell any songbooks produced pursuant to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the song books from the product description and manufacturing sections but still referring to them in TL's obligation to sell any songbooks produced, an internal contradiction is created. This makes the enforceability of agreements concerning song books uncertain, as they are described but not explicitly defined as part of the manufactured "Product".

perturbation.original_text: Integrity will obtain master                   lease and print agreements with all third party owners of                   masters embodied in the Product at its own expense. Mechanical                   rates will not exceed [**]/1/ percent ([**]/1/%) of the                   then-current statutory rate, and Print licenses will not                   exceed a prorated portion of [**]/1/ percent ([**]/1/%) of the                   retail selling price, Integrity will also manufacture the                   Product and sell to TL its requirements for resale.
perturbation.changed_text: Integrity will obtain master lease agreements with all third party owners of masters embodied in the Product at its own expense. Mechanical rates will not exceed [**]/1/ percent ([**]/1/%) of the then-current statutory rate, Integrity will also manufacture the Product and sell to TL its requirements for resale.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to print agreements and print licenses from Integrity's responsibilities in Section 1(c), the agreement now has an omission that creates in-text contradictions with other sections that talk about sales of printed products. This makes the obligations for royalties paid and sales of the printed product ambiguous, reducing the enforceability.

perturbation.original_text: Integrity will honor the notice requirement relating to the                   Integrity Trademarks and will place such trademarks on all                   products and advertising produced hereunder in accordance with                   the applicable regulations and Integrity guidelines. Integrity                   warrants that it has all rights to grant TL the right to use                   the Integrity Trademarks and will indemnify and hold TL                   harmless with respect thereto. TL recognizes Integrity's title                   to the Integrity Trademarks and will not at any time do or                   suffer to be done any act or thing which will in any way                   impair Integrity's rights in and to the Integrity Trademarks.
perturbation.changed_text: Integrity will honor the notice requirement relating to the Integrity Trademarks. Integrity warrants that it has all rights to grant TL the right to use the Integrity Trademarks and will indemnify and hold TL harmless with respect thereto. TL recognizes Integrity's title to the Integrity Trademarks and will not at any time do or suffer to be done any act or thing which will in any way impair Integrity's rights in and to the Integrity Trademarks.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the clause that Integrity will place trademarks on all products and advertising produced, this omission creates an ambiguity regarding the use of Integrity's Trademarks. This creates uncertainty regarding trademark usage requirements, creating enforceability challenges for the trademark agreement.
